name: Cave Diver (neonjeff)
description:
Normal dives may end when you hit the water, but not this time!  Do as many combos until your lungs or body give out.  Combos reset any time you hit the ground.

Controls:

A/D:  move left and right

Spacebar: Jump

Left/Right Click: Front/Back flip

Combo Scoring:

(flips + length) * multiplier

Multiplier is based on having front flips, back flips, and long trick time.  

If you do too many front or back flips in a row you might get sick and also get an added multiplier.

The human model is here https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/characters/humanoids/fantasy/free-low-p..., but everything else I believe I made myself.

https://github.com/jeffthardy/lddjam7
